MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. We had no advance warning of this however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair to an underground cable, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:37 AM on Monday, 02 November 2020.
